Text:
I remember when I first heard You Outta Know, I hated the song.

My first listen of the album....I hated it too.


BUT


It somehow grew on me....my ex-gf stole this from me years ago...never did get it back.

Great torrent :)

Weird...I bought this for a (now) gf, didn't like it at first but now miss it far more than her!
Pretty sure it's a classic everyone should have.
Cheers guys.
